topic.head: NEW HORIZONS
topic.intro: Super Mario Galaxy 2 packs new ideas and challenges in all the nooks and crannies of its all-new galaxies. Take a look at our selection of key new features!

topic.head: WELCOME TO WHOLE NEW WORLDS
topic.intro: Take the jump and join Mario in space! There's no need to be nervous - Super Mario Galaxy 2 includes a special DVD to help you get going and several aspects of the game provide support along the way!
topic.outro:
You can find more info about these special support options
wherever you see this friendly little guy!

topic.label: topic_01
topic.title:
Mario sets off for the stars
in an all-new adventure!

sub_01.nav:
Explore wild and wacky planets
in the search for Power Stars.
sub_01.head: Explore wild and wacky planets in the search for Power Stars.
sub_01.body: Join the one and only Mario as you journey to mind-blowing planets where all-new pitfalls and perils await you.
sub_01.storyBody:
It is time once again for the Stardust Festival, held once every hundred years when the Mushroom Kingdom is showered in shining stardust.

Receiving an invitation from Princess Peach, Mario heads for the castle accompanied by a stray star child he found wandering the cosmos.

But when Mario arrives at the castle, it's already too late. Bowser has harnessed the power of the stars and whisked the helpless Peach away.

An epic cosmic quest to rescue Peach is about to begin...
sub_01.story01Body: On a cosmic quest to rescue Princess Peach.
sub_01.story02Body:
The star child
who lends Mario
star power.
sub_01.story03Body: Does all he can to support Mario on his quest.

sub_02.head: Your Loyal Partner Yoshi is Here!
sub_02.body: All of Yoshi's familiar moves are present and correct as he swallows enemies and hovers in the air with his Flutter Jump. But might there be new abilities to discover...?

sub_03.head:
Playing Together
is Easier than Ever!
sub_03.body: Grab a second Wii Remote and team up with another player. Co-Star Mode is more accessible than ever with a whole host of new things to do.

sub_01_01.body_01: Tilt the Control Stick and Mario will run in that direction. Gravity means Mario can run round planets as if he was on a flat surface.
sub_01_01.body_02: Press the A Button and Mario will jump. Mario can jump to reach high places or stomp on enemies.
sub_01_01.body_03:
Shake the Wii Remote to make Mario spin. Mario can take out enemies with a spin or trigger devices.

By spinning in mid-air, Mario can stay airborne for slightly longer.
sub_01_01.body_04: Pick up Star Bits by pointing at them with the Wii Remote. Then point at your enemies and shoot them with Star Bits!

sub_01_02.body_01: Get hold of a Spin Drill and you'll be able to drill into the ground and even go right through to the other side of planets.
sub_01_02.body_02: Different stages have different means of transport available. Steer by simply tilting the Wii Remote.
sub_01_02.body_03: There are all kinds of ingenious devices for you to discover as you progress through the levels.

sub_01_03.body_01: Jump on top of clouds. You can even make three cloud platforms under Mario's feet.
sub_01_03.body_02: Shake the Wii Remote and Mario will curl into a boulder and bowl enemies over with tremendous force.

sub_01_04.title:
Mario's Familiar Transformations Are
Present And Correct!
sub_01_04.body_01:
Briefly take flight and grab
hold of honey walls.
sub_01_04.body_03:
Bounce along and use the spring
to leap to huge heights.
sub_01_04.body_04:
Temporarily gain the ability
to throw fireballs.
sub_01_04.body_05:
Become temporarily invincible
and defeat enemies simply
by touching them.

sub_02.title: Yoshi's Moves
sub_02.bottom: Eat special fruits and Yoshi will gain a range of abilities.
sub_02.body_01: By pointing with the Wii Remote and pressing the B Button, Yoshi can stick his tongue out to swallow fruits and foes alike.
sub_02.body_02: Certain enemies can be swallowed and then spat out in the desired direction.
sub_02.body_03: Fruit and foes with roots in the ground can be unearthed with a deft flick of Yoshi's tongue.
sub_02.body_04: Making use of Yoshi's tongue, you can leap further than with a normal jump.
sub_02.body_05: Hold the A Button down while jumping to get higher and stay in the air for longer than usual.
sub_02.body_06: Shake the Wii Remote to shake Yoshi's head, knocking out enemies or triggering devices.
sub_02.body_07: If you take damage while riding Yoshi, he will run away. Jump or spin near to Yoshi before he returns to his egg to ride him again.

sub_02_01.body_01: When Yoshi eats a Dash Pepper, he'll dash forward at high speed. This can also propel Yoshi up steep slopes rapidly.
sub_02_01.body_02: When Yoshi eats a Blimp Fruit, his belly swells up like a balloon and he can float in the air while slowly exhaling.
sub_02_01.body_03: When Yoshi eats a Bulb Berry, his body lights up, illuminating new areas he can walk on.

topic.label: topic_03
topic.title: Mario's Adventure Unfolds
topic.body_01:
Fuelled by Power Stars, this Mario-shaped starship is your base during your adventure.

As Mario 's voyages take him to more exotic galaxies, you'll be able to bring back items from your adventures to add more facilities and decorate the ship with. The ship will also become more lively as more characters take up residence there.
topic.body_02: Each world contains a number of wildly-varied galaxies. Search for the stolen Power Stars hidden in each galaxy and open up new areas to explore.
topic.body_03: The Hungry Lumas found on the World Map are star children with more-than-healthy appetites. Feed them Star Bits and see what happens...
topic.body_04:
Collect the required number of Power Stars and you'll be able to continue to new areas. One tactic is to put off galaxies you're
having trouble with until later and collect
Power Stars in galaxies you're more comfortable with.
topic.body_05:
At the end of each world, you'll mount a direct attack on Bowser and his boy's base.

Explore ultra-challenging galaxies as you
get nearer the final showdown where you'll battle for the prize of a Grand Star with Bowser & Bowser Jr.
topic.body_06: Once you've defeated Bowser and co. and grabbed the Grand Star, a portal to the next world opens up.
topic.body_07: With the Grand World Map, it's easy to move between worlds that you've been to before.
topic.body_08: There's a Comet Medal hidden in each galaxy. Collect a lot of them and a Prankster Comet will appear and open a new challenge to you.
topic.body_09:
Progress through the game and you'll be able to control Mario's younger brother, Luigi. He'll occasionally appear in some galaxies.

Luigi can jump slightly higher than Mario and slides on the ground more so you'll be able to enjoy a refreshing change whenever you play as him.

topic.label: topic_04
topic.title: Get A Helping Hand
topic.sub: New to Super Mario Galaxy? Lack faith in your abilities? Fear not - help is at hand!
topic.bigButton3: Let The Cosmic Spirit Guide You

sub_01_01.title: 2-Player Co-Star Mode
sub_01_01.title_01: Point at Star Bits to collect them. Press the B Button to launch them at your target.
sub_01_01.sub_01_01_02: ...line it up with the Star Bit...
sub_01_01.title_02:
Point at enemies and press the A Button to stop them in their tracks.
You can also take them out with a spin attack.
sub_01_01.title_03: Bring faraway coins and items closer to Mario.
sub_01_01.sub_01_03_02: ...then point at it and press the A Button.
sub_01_01.sub_01_03_04:
...and grabbing it
is a piece of cake!
sub_01_01.title_04: Throw a spanner in the works or get devices moving with a spin attack.

sub_01_02.title: Tune Into The Tip Network!
sub_01_02.body:
Watch the video demonstrations of the Tip Network to pick up advice on how to negotiate tricky sections and progress through the game.

There's no penalty for checking out the Tip Network so tune in whenever you can to pick up handy hints.

sub_01_03.title: Let The Cosmic Spirit Guide You
sub_01_03.body:
In certain galaxies, if you keep getting stuck in the same place, the Cosmic Spirit might appear as you play the level.

By making use of the Cosmic Spirit's power, Mario will move of his own accord to within reach of Power Stars, allowing you to progress beyond a difficult section.
sub_01_03.infoTitle: Power Stars You Get With The Cosmic Spirit's Help Become Bronze Stars
sub_01_03.infoBody: You won't complete your Power Star collection if you get Bronze Stars, but you can always try again and grab the Power Stars without assistance from the Cosmic Spirit.
